name: Badam Ka Halwa Recipe | Gulzar Hussain | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Badam Ka Halwa Recipe: Semolina 250gm Almond Paste 1 cup Khoya 250gm Milk 2 cup Sugar Â½ cup Almond essence 1 tsp Clarified Butter 1 cup Almonds for garnish
instructions: Make almond paste. In a pan, heat clarified butter add semolina & cook it. Now add milk, sugar and almond paste & cook it well. Then add khoya and almond essence mix it well and cook it till clarified is separate. In last dish out Halwa & decorate it with almonds & server it.
